name: Jumpy Ninja
description:
Go as high as you can before your energy bar is depleted. Hitting your head when climbing or getting hit by the ninja stars will take a huge chunk of your energy. Eating rice will restore part of your energy. Energy also gets depleted over time, and the movement increases with the time, making it harder the longer you take to climb.

Jumpy Ninja is an small game project I made originally for Android. It uses LibGDX and is coded in Java (and thus JRE has to be installed on your computer).

Controls:

One click: Short jump
Double click: Double jump
